Html:
Hello, thanks for a great library!

Is it possible to export audio waveform visualization (to PNG or SVG)? I just need to get a source "raw" peak levels for the whole file (without intermediate converting to WAV file) and then save it to some kind of file...

Thanks in advance.

best way is to use the Windows Forms Graphics object and draw the waveform onto that. You create a graphics object from an Image, and you can then simply save the image. If you are a Pluralsight subscriber I do a session on waveform drawing in my NAudio course.
